oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows Teams to call the app's web APIs as the current user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Teams can access app's web APIs
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Enable Teams to call this app's web APIs with the same rights that you have
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Teams can access app's web APIs and make requests on your behalf
